div.p: The way I stay connected with the ACCESS Department-the primary way is face to face.
That's the primary, and the old fashion, most effective way.
However, I do email my instructor via the Web Advisor.
I do email my advisor via that medium.
I also use Facebook a lot.
But primarily I Facebook, I email, I call.
And most importantly, I make sure that at least once or twice a week I stop
by the ACCESS office, because we're busy and we need to make sure take our part
in keeping the lines of communication open.
